name: iTap Birds
description:
iTap Birds is a fast-paced, highly-addictive finger-tapping experience!  With 40 levels of extreme fun ranging from easy to not so easy.  This game is great for kids and adults!  Weather you're bored at work, or want to have a competition among friends, iTap Birds can provide you with hours of fun!

Find that bird then tap it fast! The quicker you are, the more points you earn.   Race against the clock to receive bonus points for tapping all the birds in a given round before your time is up.  Beat a level, and you'll unlock the next one.  Plus you can receive a 100% Accuracy Bonus (20 points, plus a ribbon) if you don't make a mistake. Just look closely before you tap, because some of the birds look similar!

Your performance is graded by 1 to 3 stars.  Get through all the levels first, then you can go back and attempt to get 3 Stars and an Accuracy Bonus on every level!

Game Features:
* 40 Levels
* Achieve 1 to 3 stars
* Perfect Accuracy Bonus
* Happy Birds!

Your 5-Star ratings and feedback keep the updates coming!
